description: This file defines the custom exception class UnprocessableEntityException, which extends RuntimeException, signaling a 422 Unprocessable Entity error in the application.

classes.name: UnprocessableEntityException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception indicating an Unprocessable Entity scenario, such as invalid or unreadable input data.

methods.name: UnprocessableEntityException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that creates an exception with a specified detail message.

methods.name: UnprocessableEntityException(String message, Throwable cause)
methods.description: Constructor that creates an exception with a specified detail message and cause.
